Package epfl.sweng.servercomm

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DownloadJSONFromServer
    Asyncronous task that runs a background thread that fetches a new Question from the SwEng server.
    QuizEditExecution
    Asyncronous task that runs a background thread that sends a new Question to the SwEng server.
    ServerInteractions
    The ServerInteractions class contains methods for performing network operations, such as ServerInteractions.getRandomQuestion() and ServerInteractions.submitQuestion(List).
    SwengHttpClientFactory
    The SwengHttpClientFactory class is an HTTP Client factory.
